Package com.group11.game

Class Acorn

java.lang.Object
com.group11.game.Items
com.group11.game.Acorn
public class Acorn extends Items
The Acorn class extends the Items class and represents an Acorn item in the game.

    • Acorn

      public Acorn()
      Constructor for the Acorn class. Initializes the name to "Acorn", sets collision to true, and assigns a score of 100.
